name: Hangman Hearts
description:
* Hangman with 8 bit retro graphics and sounds!
* Test your IQ on 7 Categories with hundreds of words to figure out!
* Categories: Animals, Anatomy, Astronomy, Countries & Continents, Home, People, and Food
* Permanently increase hearts to 8! (** Full Version only)

Can you figure out all the words?

How to play:
- Press any letter to guess the word
- If the word does not contain the letter you LOSE a heart!
- If you lose all your hearts, you move to another word
- Guess the word before the hearts count down to 0!

* Things to Note:
1) Words will keep reappearing at a random point in the future until solved.
2) When a hint is revealed for a word, it remains revealed until the game is deleted.
